A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I am not a bot\, but I wonder about the reviewers who are leaving 5 stars.  Most reviewers of this movie that are critical are giving a litany of reasons why.  They go into detail about what they found wrong with this movie.  So much so that I won't I will just say that I was profoundly disappointed.

However\, most people that are giving it 5 stars are often not giving as in-depth reasons why they liked this movie.  So\, why are the negative reviewers being accused of being bots (or worse)?

I'd really like to know...what did people who are giving it such high marks like about this movie?  

Is it...
The dumb jokes?
The lack of continuity?
Luke acting like a sullen brat?
Flying Leia?
The annoying Rose?
The boring casino part?
Yoda acting like a lunatic?

I could go on\, but I really didn't want to list my complaints.  I just wanted to know what people actually liked about this movie.....PEOPLE THAT WEREN"T PAID OFF BY DISNEY that is.
